item.title: Coldplay - Yellow - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Yellow by Coldplay from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A, Am, Am7, C, D, F, G.

item.title: Coldplay - The Scientist - Key of F - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song The Scientist by Coldplay from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: B♭, C, Dm, F, Fsus2.

item.title: Coldplay - Viva La Vida - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Viva La Vida by Coldplay from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Bm, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Coldplay - A Sky Full of Stars - Key of Dm - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song A Sky Full of Stars by Coldplay from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am7, B♭, C, Dm, F.

item.title: Coldplay - Every Teardrop is a Waterfall - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Every Teardrop is a Waterfall by Coldplay from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, C♯m7, D, E, F♯m.
